record.id: field.name="status" and file.name="contract" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: status
record.file.name: contract

detail.detail: Typically contract status is one of the following:
Draft: A contract is in draft status when the contract term has not yet begun. The initial state of any contract is draft when first added to Service Manager.
Current: Once a contract term has begun, Service Manager changes the status of the contract to Current.
Expired: When the expiration date has passed, Service Manager changes the status of the contract to Expired.
Cancelled: If at any time a user cancels the contract, the status reverts to cancelled.
Renewed: If the Auto-Renew flag for the contract is set to true, when the contract reaches its expiration date, Service Manager sets the status of the contract to Renewed.
